title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 81.5 - Maintenance of docket
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 81.5 - Maintenance of docket

State Regulations

The Industrial Commissioner shall maintain as a bound, permanent public record of the Labor Department a docket in which shall be
entered: (a) The action taken upon all
applications to register devices adopted by a bona fide labor union or
associations of employees in the form of label, brand, mark, name or other
character, and
(b) The
determination of the Board of Standards and Appeals in respect to objections or
complaints filed by any union or person aggrieved. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
81.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
